item.title: UniCredit Nears Endgame on Banco BPM Bid With Wednesday Deadline
item.description: Eight months after UniCredit SpA made its move on Banco BPM SpA, time is running out for Andrea Orcel.

item.title: Italy’s Market Authority Mulls Pausing UniCredit’s Banco BPM Bid
item.description: Italy’s market regulator Consob is analyzing whether to suspend UniCredit SpA’s takeover bid for Banco BPM SpA, after an Italian court challenged some of the requirements imposed by the government on
